headline.print_headline: 10 US Cities Vow to Slash Emissions From Buildings
headline.main: 10 US Cities Vow to Slash Emissions From Buildings

docs.snippet: Mayors from 10 U.S. cities took aim at their skylines Wednesday, pledging to reduce greenhouse-gas emissions from their buildings....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mayors from 10 U.S. cities took aim at their skylines Wednesday, pledging to reduce greenhouse-gas emissions from their buildings.

headline.print_headline: Analysis: Oil Trains to Keep Rumbling Through North America's Cities
headline.main: Analysis: Oil Trains to Keep Rumbling Through North America's Cities

docs.snippet: Mile-long trains carrying crude oil will likely keep chugging through North American cities even after a string of fiery disasters spurred safety officials to urge that railways send risky cargo along less populated routes....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mile-long trains carrying crude oil will likely keep chugging through North American cities even after a string of fiery disasters spurred safety officials to urge that railways send risky cargo along less populated routes.

headline.print_headline: Tesco, Waitrose to Launch 'Click and Collect' With London Underground
headline.main: Tesco, Waitrose to Launch 'Click and Collect' With London Underground

docs.snippet: Supermarket chains Tesco and Waitrose are to begin "click and collect" services across the London Underground network after signing a deal with the city's transport authority....
docs.lead_paragraph: Supermarket chains Tesco and Waitrose are to begin "click and collect" services across the London Underground network after signing a deal with the city's transport authority.

headline.print_headline: Marussia Make It to the Test-After a Breakdown
headline.main: Marussia Make It to the Test-After a Breakdown

docs.snippet: While some Formula One teams struggled to get their 2014 cars working in pre-season testing on Wednesday, tail-enders Marussia suffered a breakdown before they had even got theirs to the Jerez circuit....
docs.lead_paragraph: While some Formula One teams struggled to get their 2014 cars working in pre-season testing on Wednesday, tail-enders Marussia suffered a breakdown before they had even got theirs to the Jerez circuit.

headline.print_headline: House GOP Leaders Face Challenge on Immigration
headline.main: House GOP Leaders Face Challenge on Immigration

docs.snippet: House Republican leaders poised to revive efforts to overhaul the immigration system with new broad policy principles are facing a direct challenge from a GOP senator who is warning against a headlong rush toward reform....

headline.print_headline: Elway: Manning Can't Really Seal Legacy Sunday
headline.main: Elway: Manning Can't Really Seal Legacy Sunday

headline.print_headline: Obama's Shout-Out to Rubio: Not the Most Welcome Embrace
headline.main: Obama's Shout-Out to Rubio: Not the Most Welcome Embrace

docs.snippet: It probably was not the kind of attention Republican Senator Marco Rubio was seeking: a shout-out from President Barack Obama during the nationally televised State of the Union address....
docs.lead_paragraph: It probably was not the kind of attention Republican Senator Marco Rubio was seeking: a shout-out from President Barack Obama during the nationally televised State of the Union address.
